sn47.7:1.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa duggā visamā desā, yattha neva makkaṭānaṁ cārī na manussānaṁ.
sn47.7:1.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa duggā visamā desā, yattha makkaṭānañhi kho cārī, na manussānaṁ.
sn47.7:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, himavato pabbatarājassa samā bhūmibhāgā ramaṇīyā, yattha makkaṭānañceva cārī manussānañca.
sn47.7:1.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, luddā makkaṭavīthīsu lepaṁ oḍḍenti makkaṭānaṁ bādhanāya.
sn47.7:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te makkaṭā abālajātikā alolajātikā, te taṁ lepaṁ disvā ārakā parivajjanti.
sn47.7:2.2: Yo pana so hoti makkaṭo bālajātiko lolajātiko, so taṁ lepaṁ upasaṅkamitvā hatthena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:2.8: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pādañcā’ti dutiyena pādena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:2.10: ‘Ubho hatthe mocessāmi pāde cā’ti tuṇḍena gaṇhāti.
sn47.7:2.12: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, makkaṭo pañcoḍḍito thunaṁ seti anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo luddassa.
sn47.7:2.13: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, luddo vijjhitvā tasmiṁyeva kaṭṭhakataṅgāre avassajjetvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
sn47.7:2.14: Evaṁ so taṁ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
sn47.7:3.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
sn47.7:3.2: Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṁ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47.7:3.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
sn47.7:3.7: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
sn47.7:3.11: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā.
sn47.7:4.1: Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye.
sn47.7:4.2: Gocare, bhikkhave, carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
sn47.7:4.3: Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?
sn47.7:4.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
sn47.7:4.10: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn47.7:4.11: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti.
